column4: If he has 3 gigs of ram he shouldn't be using that much swap anyhow, unless he's rendering.
hmm, well I suppose the 200% rule doesn't follow for such large amounts of memory.
I've found that most rules don't apply. I have 2 gigs, a gig of SWAP, but I've got the swap usage turned down to below 10%
hmm. Beyond a certain usage the thrashing tends to get unbearable.
